It is lightweight, performant, highly-configurable, and automatically adds OS, CPU, and Git information to your logs. Hooks, dot-notation remap, omit, and pick of metadata.

Great for large dev teams, old/new projects, and works w/Pino, Bunyan, Winston, console, and more. It is lightweight, performant, highly-configurable, and automatically adds OS, CPU, and Git information to your logs. Hooks, dot-notation remap, omit, and pick of metadata.
